imdb.title: Gakuen Alice
imdb.plot: Best friends Mikan and Hotaru are separated when Hotaru is scouted by a special school called "Alice Academy." Mikan determines to enroll too but Alice Academy is a mysterious place.

episodes.title: The School's Going to Be Shut Down
episodes.plot: When Mikan's best friend Hotaru transfers to the mysterious Alice Academy she immediately enrolls to become a student, knowing once you arrive you can never leave.

episodes.title: Welcome to Alice Academy
episodes.plot: Mikan meets the other students and is shocked to discover everyone has a special power, which is also known as having a special Alice.

episodes.title: No Alice Is Going to Defeat Me
episodes.plot: When the class finds out that Mikan doesn't know her own Alice, Natsume challenges her: If she can survive going through the North Forest then he and the rest of class will accept her.

episodes.title: This Is My Alice
episodes.plot: Natsume is angered during a dispute and tries to burn Mikan with his fire Alice, but a bright blue light intervenes and Natsume is unable to use his powers. Could this be Mikan's Alice?

episodes.title: The Star Ranking System Sure Can Be Severe
episodes.plot: Mikan discovers she has the nullification Alice, but after upsetting a teacher, she is given a no star and must live with the worst of everything including food, dorm, and chores.

episodes.title: I'm a Good-for-Nothing Type?
episodes.plot: Mikan feels her Alice is useless compared to her classmates' cool powers. Luckily her sadness subsides after meeting Tsubasa, a middle school student who happens to be in her group.

episodes.title: Not Gonna Lose - Alice Dodgeball
episodes.plot: Mikan challenges Natsume to a dodge ball game where using your Alice is fair play.

episodes.title: I Want to See Grandpa
episodes.plot: Mikan is upset with Narumi who hasn't been mailing her letters home. But she has a change of heart when he comes to her rescue during a dangerous situation.

episodes.title: My Dear Master Hotaru
episodes.plot: A robot that Hotaru built named Amanatsu is desperate to help during a student competition and will stop at nothing to find a way to be useful.

episodes.title: So Exciting - Central Town
episodes.plot: Mikan and Natsume decide to embark on a journey to Central Town, the mall where everything sold is made by Alices.

episodes.title: Alice Training Currently in Session
episodes.plot: Mikan's dorm catches on fire, which brings back unpleasant memories for Natsume. When all the students use their Alices to help put it out, Mikan learns that her Alice only works when she wants to protect someone.

episodes.title: The School Festival Is Coming
episodes.plot: The two-week school festival has begun and students have the opportunity to win a prize if they perform. Can Mikan convince her group to use their Alices in competition?

episodes.title: Chase the Top Star
episodes.plot: Reo, a former student and now-famous singer, performs during the festival. However, the big star has other plans besides a performance. His real mission is to kidnap Natsume!

episodes.title: Get Natsume Back
episodes.plot: During a rescue mission, Mikan and Sumire feign unconsciousness and discover dark secrets about Alice Academy.

episodes.title: Let's Go Back to the Academy
episodes.plot: During a daring rescue mission Mikam must convince Natsume to refrain from blowing himself up.

episodes.title: Maze Match: The Magic Lamp
episodes.plot: Narumi, Natsume, Ruka, and Sumire work to spark interest in a special maze game that's been set up for the festival.

episodes.title: Hotaru's Secret
episodes.plot: Mikan joins Natsume and Ruka for the rest of the festival and as the festivities continue a surprise relationship is revealed that shocks everyone.

episodes.title: Alone in the Dark Together
episodes.plot: Mikan and Natsume end up at a haunted house attraction. Things turn very spooky when they get separated from the rest of the group and become trapped in the house by a wall that suddenly appears.

episodes.title: Raise the Curtain - Snow White in the Sleeping Forest
episodes.plot: After an accident that involves Hotaru, a camera, and a sticky substance, Mikan ends up playing the prince and Natsume ends up playing a jungle cat during a festival play performance.

episodes.title: Last Dance with Whom?
episodes.plot: When it's time for the festival's last dance, both Natsume and Ruka want to partner with an oblivious Mikan.

episodes.title: Strive for the Honor Student Award
episodes.plot: Those with top exam marks are rewarded with a trip back to their family and a Central Town shopping ticket. As Mikan dedicates herself to studying the student body follows suit.

episodes.title: The Bear and the Prince
episodes.plot: Kaname, who possesses the Alice of putting souls into dolls, creates some for his classmates but the students soon learn his Alice comes at a price.

episodes.title: The Circus Has Arrived
episodes.plot: The circus has come to Alice Academy and Mikan, who is inpired by the show, begins preaching that students should refrain from using their Alices.

episodes.title: Mr. Narumi's a Liar
episodes.plot: The students rebel when Natsume is forced to go on another mission, which causes them to become angry and restless.

episodes.title: Take Back the Academy
episodes.plot: Upon finding out that Reo was behind everything, the students change sides and work together with the teachers to bring him down.

episodes.title: Friendship Is Endless
episodes.plot: Mikan finds out that Hotaru is transferring after graduation. Can she let Hotaru go while maintaining their friendship?
